entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Flurries beginning before morning. Local blowing snow late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 7.
